QuestData.Title: Novice Elreth
QuestData.Description: Why don't you go speak with my novice, Elreth? She serves me, and will have some tasks to which you can apply your new abilities.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Novice Elreth at Deathknell in Tirisfal Glades.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Novice Elreth at Deathknell in Tirisfal Glades.
QuestData.RewardText: May the Dark Lady watch over you, $n.
